articles.description: We're pumping so much groundwater and transferring it to the oceans that it's shifting a ton of water mass that's affecting Earth's rotational pole.
articles.content:
Below the Earth's surface lies over a thousand times more water than all the rivers and lakes in the world.
This groundwater accounts for almost all the freshwater on the planet.
But in many areas … [+3187 chars]

articles.title: iPhone Live Voicemail: How to use and turn off/on in iOS 17 - 9to5Mac
articles.description: This detailed guide with screenshots covers how to turn off/on iPhone Live Voicemail, how to use the feature, and more.
articles.content: iPhone Live Voicemail is a new feature arriving with iOS 17 that will help with the growing problem of spam calls as well as deciding when you want/need to answer from callers you do know. Follow alo… [+1749 chars]
